title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 12 July 2009 - XWiki
content:
anamarias - (12/07/2009 00:20): hi sdumitriu  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:20): Hi  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:20): hi sdumitriu!  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:21): I'll be a couple of hours .. but I will be a little bit busy because on tuesday I present my graduation project  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:21): Oh  
anamarias - (12/07/2009 00:21): i'm using http://webchat.freenode.net/ because the usual irc client is not working (internet connection problems). so i didn't see the message, and it's possible will happen again   
anamarias - (12/07/2009 00:21): I will be available on Monday  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:22): cristinas: Do you prefer tomorrow?  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:22): I'd like to discuss your projects  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:22): yes  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:22): i would be better for me tomorrow  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:22): if you can  
anamarias - (12/07/2009 00:22): for me it's good either days  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:22): Sure  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:23): anamarias: How about you?  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:23): Ah  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:23): So better on Monday for me, OK?  
anamarias - (12/07/2009 00:23): ok, monday then  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:25): tomorrow at what hour should I be online ? (we have problems with the irc client and I have to know earlier  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:25): to go in another place)  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:25): Which client?  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:25): they closed some ports  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:26): so doesn't work any usual irc client  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:26): That's stupid  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:26): now I use a web-based one  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:26): And in some countries even illegal  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:26): well in our campus seems to be ok :-|  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 00:26): Let's say 1 PM .ro time?  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:27): perfect  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 00:27): for me any hour is ok , so you can choose what is better for you  
anamarias left at 01:30 (Ping timeout: 180 seconds)  
sdumitriu left at 01:42 ("Leaving.")  
cristinas left at 01:49 ("Page closed")

asyd - (12/07/2009 11:30): hello there  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 11:31  
alexmaru left at 11:31 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
alexmaru1 left at 11:31 ()  
alexmaru joined #xwiki at 11:31  
alexmaru - (12/07/2009 11:32): hi asyd  
alexmaru - (12/07/2009 11:32): :)  
lucaa1 joined #xwiki at 11:43  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 12:02): sdumitriu: hi!  
anamarias left at 12:02 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 12:02): Hi cristinas  
cristinas - (12/07/2009 12:03): should we talk now?  
marta\_ joined #xwiki at 12:03  
anamarias joined #xwiki at 12:03  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 12:04): Yes  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:04): Hello everyone  
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 12:05): hi arunreddy   
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 12:05): Hi arunreddy  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:05): marta\_, sdumitriu : hi  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 12:05): It will take a bit more until I commit the changes to your code  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 12:05): I ended up doing more changes  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:06): Sdumitriu, I have changed the code a bit inlcuding parametrized code and java doc  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:06): can i submit or should i wait ?  
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 12:06): arunreddy: you can commit  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:07): Ok  
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 12:08): arunreddy: your DefaultWikiImporter is... well... wrong  
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 12:09): the point of components is not having to write "if"s enymore  
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 12:09): \*anymore  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:09): am not clear.  
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 12:10): and there you switch pieces of code for the mediawiki import and for the confluence import  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:10): yeah. i have changed the code today  
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 12:10): you should have a component for each one of those  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:10): coming up with two seperate ones  
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 12:10): great  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:11): mediawikiimporter and confluencewikiimporter with diff hints   
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 12:11): ok, that's good  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:11): and it solves the issues with parametriezed code too.  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:12): But i have one more issue to be discussed.   
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:12): can i have two different components for two different export types of a same wiki   
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 12:13): Yes  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:13): MediaWiki Export type xml  and MediaWiki export type sql  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 12:13): You should have hints like "mediawiki/xml", "mediawiki/sql"  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 12:13): And in general, "wiki/type"  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:13): Ok :)  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 12:14): Ok i will change few things and commit the code.   
arunreddy\_ joined #xwiki at 12:25  
arunreddy\_ - (12/07/2009 12:27): sdumitriu : Is it advisable to push all the methods related to Importing data to XWiki  ( ImportToXWiki.java )  Import MediaWiki to XWiki , confluence to respective components.   
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 12:28): What do you mean "push"?  
arunreddy\_ - (12/07/2009 12:29): move the methods.  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 12:31): Yes

marta\_ - (12/07/2009 13:43): ok, thanks  
arunreddy\_ - (12/07/2009 13:44): Kindly leave some comments on the java doc.  
arunreddy\_ - (12/07/2009 13:44): in your free time. :)

arunreddy - (12/07/2009 15:33): Is gsoc.myxwiki.org down for maintenance  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 15:33): ?  
gwash1 left at 15:33 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
asyd - (12/07/2009 15:41): 28  
asyd - (12/07/2009 15:41): oups  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 15:56): arunreddy: It's probably blocked  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 15:56): I'll restart it now  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 15:57): Blocked by ?  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 15:57): Ok. Thank you.  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 15:58): Blocked by Heap errors  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 15:59): arunreddy: Restarted, works fine now  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 15:59): Thanks  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 16:00): sdumitriu : Can you commit the code.  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 16:01): I will a bit later, now I'm fighting some IE6 bugs  
arunreddy - (12/07/2009 16:01): Ok. Good Luck :)  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 16:01): Thanks

gcarrier joined #xwiki at 20:04  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:04): hi!  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:04): i'd like to deliver a different skin based on a cookie or the domain name used...  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:04): Hi gcarrier  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:04): any idea whether there's a quick-and-dirty hack for something like this? :)  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:06): When you say domain name, do you use virtual wikis?  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:07): http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Virtualization  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:08): sdumitriu: same content!  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:10): Which one do you prefer, cookie, or domain name?  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:10): sdumitriu: domain name  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:10): K  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:10): sdumitriu: or GET parameter  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:11): sdumitriu: but then it should be transmitted through the navigation (in a iframe :()  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:11): Edit <xwiki folder>/templates/stylesheets.vm  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:11): yup?  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:12): any doc for this vm format?  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:12): and/or color syntaxing in textmate :)  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:12): Wait, writing it...  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:12): sdumitriu: ok thx a lot!  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:15): this .vm format... is it specific to xwiki?  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:15): au fait je suis francais aussi :)  
arunreddy left at 20:16 (Read error: 104 (Connection reset by peer))  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:17): is it velocity!?!  
tachirei joined #xwiki at 20:18  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:20): And replace:  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:20): <link href="$defaultStyleURL" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" />  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:20): with:  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:20): #if($request.serverName == "www.domainA.net")  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:20): <link href="/xwiki/bin/skin/skins/SkinA/style.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" />  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:20): #elseif($request.serverName == "www.domainB.net")  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:20): <link href="/xwiki/bin/skin/skins/SkinB/style.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" />  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:20): #else  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:20): <link href="/xwiki/bin/skin/skins/SkinC/style.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" />  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:20): #end  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:20): gcarrier: Yes, it's velocity, using the XWiki API  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:20): sdumitriu: nice.  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:21): why are there # everywhere??  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:21): that's necessary to indicate code!?  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:21): This is the velocity syntax  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:21): #if, #else  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:22): # marks instructions  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:22): $ marks variables  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:22): $request, $xwiki...  
tachirei left #xwiki at 20:22  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:22): do you provie a simple and clean startup skin?  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:23): something "zen"  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:23): gcarrier: The finch skin is lightweight, but it hasn't been maintained for a while  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:23): btw, thx a lot ;)  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:23): Some things might not work  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:24): http://maven.xwiki.org/snapshots/com/xpn/xwiki/platform/skins/xwiki-skin-finch/1.1-SNAPSHOT/  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:24): We will write a new lightweight skin in the future  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:25): But it will take a while, since there are other more important issues to be solved  
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 20:25): the finch skin is really really old and deprecated  
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 20:25): i wouldn't use it  
marta\_ - (12/07/2009 20:26): there are many cool features that are not available in it  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:26): ok, i won't then ;)  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:28): how can i automate the creation of a space per user please?  
gcarrier - (12/07/2009 20:28): in enterprise version  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:29): I don't know, I haven't used this feature so far  
sdumitriu - (12/07/2009 20:29): It's possible, since it was done in XWiki Workspaces and Curriki, but I don't know the details
